DOC.brief_summary: This observational study ass predictor early on-treatment sustained virological response treatment-naïve patient chronic hepatitis C initiate treatment Pegasys ( peginterferon alfa-2a ) ribavirin . Data collect treatment period ( 24 48 week ) 12 24 week end treatment . Target sample size < 5000 .
DOC.brief_title: PROPHESYS 1 : An Observational Study Predictors Response Treatment-naïve Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Treated With Pegasys ( Peginterferon Alfa-2a )
DOC.criteria: adult patient , > /= 18 year age chronic hepatitis C inform consent data collection coinfection HIV Hepatitis B Virus ( HBV ) previous treatment peginterferon and/or ribavirin
